DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the comparative bioavailability of 2 new tablet formulations of HKI-272 with a reference capsule and an oral solution in healthy subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing 2 New Formulations of HKI-272 in Healthy Adult Subjects
DOC.criteria: Criteria: Healthy male and female subjects aged 18 to 50 years. Women of nonchildbearing potential (WONCBP)
